title: Panel Fragment
description: Panel of L\'ossu depicting the Taoist Immortal, Han Hsiang Tzu, with his emblem, the flute.  He wears a yellowish green coat woven with gold, pale flesh trousers, and a blue cap.  Mountainous landscape in shades of blue, green, brown, tan, yellow, and brick-red.  At upper right the peach tree from with he fell.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
